com.marklogic.hub.cli

Interface InstallerCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInstallerCommand, AbstractVerifyCommand, InstallIntoDhsCommand, VerifyDhfInDhsCommand

    public interface InstallerCommand

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context, Options options)
      A command is given an instance of a Spring container, which is expected to be constructed based on the properties fed into the installer, and an Options instance that captures the options the user passed into the installer.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context,
         Options options)
        A command is given an instance of a Spring container, which is expected to be constructed based on the properties fed into the installer, and an Options instance that captures the options the user passed into the installer.

        options -
